description: It's is about time to deliver the debut performance of Raging Stalliondirty blond boy Pete Ross. First there was Sky Donovan, then cameShane Rollins. Now we have Pete Ross, the filthiest boy toy we haveever seen! He looks like a boy next door, all-American, 26 year old allabout-the-apple-pie kind of guy. So what is he doing in a movie likethis? Well guys, guess what? He is a major S/M pain pig! And heshows us just how intense he can take it by receiving a world-classflogging from ever-nasty top Montaz Morgan. Indeed, Montaz puts onan amazing performance in the The Shaft, taking Pete thru a floggingand a very fine fucking!
title: The Shaft
